title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 147.9 - Agency performance rating and payment reporting requirement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 147.9 - Agency performance rating and payment reporting requirement

State Regulations

Upon the request of the Director of the Budget, each agency
shall provide timely statistical reports of performance ratings, advances and
awards in a manner prescribed by the director. Such reports shall be filed
simultaneously in a timely fashion with the Director of the Budget and the

Director of Employee Relations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
147.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
